name: filter_pokemon
description: Filter the Pokemon grid based on user criteria such as type, stats, name, or generation.

types.description: List of Pokemon types to include.

minStat.description: Minimum base stat total or specific stat value (e.g., 'strong' implies high stats > 400).

nameContains.description: Substring to search for in the Pokemon's name.

matching_pokemon_names.description: List of Pokemon names that match the user's description, especially for vague queries like 'pink pokemon' or 'legendary pokemon'.
